R

random - Variable in class ispd.motor.workload.impl.RandomicWorkloadGenerator
Distribution to be used to roll random values, using the fields RandomicWorkloadGenerator.computation and RandomicWorkloadGenerator.communication.
RANDOM - Enum constant in enum class ispd.motor.workload.WorkloadGeneratorType
Generator of tasks with randomly generated sizes, and distributed evenly among all master nodes in the system.
RandomicWorkloadGenerator - Class in ispd.motor.workload.impl
Base class for WorkloadGenerators that involve random generation of task attributes, such as computation and communication size.
It also standardizes the use of a Supplier<Integer> for generating task ids.
RandomicWorkloadGenerator(int, TwoStageUniform, TwoStageUniform, IntSupplier, Distribution) - Constructor for class ispd.motor.workload.impl.RandomicWorkloadGenerator
Initialize the class' fields with the given parameters.

ResultsCommunicationPane - Class in ispd.gui.results
A ResultsCommunicationPane is a class that represents a multipane containing the bar and pie chart of the performed communication obtained from the performed simulation.
ResultsCommunicationPane(SimulationResultChartMaker) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsCommunicationPane
Constructor which creates a pane that contains results of communication performed for each network link being shown in a bar and pie chart.
ResultsComputingPowerPane - Class in ispd.gui.results
A ResultsComputingPowerPane is a class that represents a multipane containing the bar charts showing the information about the computing power use for machines, users and tasks.
ResultsComputingPowerPane(SimulationResultChartMaker) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsComputingPowerPane
Constructor which creates a pane that contains results of the computing power usage through time for each machine, user and task in a bar chart.
ResultsDialog - Class in ispd.gui.results
A ResultsDialog class is used to display a window containing all types of information from the performed simulation.
ResultsDialog(Frame, General, GridQueueNetwork, List<GridTask>) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsDialog
Constructor which specifies the frame who is owner of this result dialog, the metrics, the queue network and the task list, these three last variables are used to construct the results to be displayed in this dialog.
ResultsGlobalPane - Class in ispd.gui.results
A ResultsGlobalPane is a class used to display the general results from the performed simulation.
ResultsGlobalPane(General, SimulationResultChartMaker, List<GridTask>) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsGlobalPane

ResultsProcessingPane(SimulationResultChartMaker) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsProcessingPane

ResultsResourcePane - Class in ispd.gui.results
A ResultsResourcePane is a class that represents a pane containing the information about all the processing and communication performed of each simulated component.
ResultsResourcePane(General) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsResourcePane
Constructor which creates a pane in which the performed results in total for each machine and each network link are shown in a tabular view.

ResultsUsersPane(GridQueueNetwork) - Constructor for class ispd.gui.results.ResultsUsersPane

RoundRobin - Class in ispd.policy.allocation.vm.impl
 
RoundRobin - Class in ispd.policy.scheduling.cloud.impl
Implementation of the RoundRobin scheduling algorithm.
RoundRobin - Class in ispd.policy.scheduling.grid.impl
Implementation of the RoundRobin scheduling algorithm.
Hands over the next task on the FIFO queue, for the next resource in a circular queue of resources.
